title: King of Dwarves

soulWeapon.advancement0:
Summons the soul of Dragon's Ruins, Atein for 10 sec. For the duratioin of the soul, increases own DEF by 60%, normal attacks deal additional P.DMG equal to 1% of own Max HP, enhancing own Skills.
[Collision] Deals ??? additional P.DMG to the target and increases P.DMG the target takes by 20% for 10 sec.
[Headbutt] Deals additional P.DMG 10% of own HP.
[Earth Incarnate] Upon activation, immediately heals HP euqal to 20% own Max HP.
soulWeapon.advancement1: Increases the duration of soul by 5 sec.
soulWeapon.advancement2: Changes the additional P.DMG proportional to Max HP from normal attacks to 2%, and increases DEF Reduction effect of [Destroy Armor] by [MISSING]% for the duration of Skill.

dark: When auto attacking, there is a 10% chance to Stun the target for 2 sec and deal extra DMG worth 10% of own HP.

profile.likes: Drinks, sand bath, smithing, and crafting
profile.dislikes: Long conferences, the royal throne, Demons (especially the Dark Dragons)

background.story: He is the stout and upright king of the Dwarves. He fought alongside the Warrior of the Holy Sword against the Demon Army 100 years ago. His heroism in defeating the Dark Dragon Legion, the core division of the Demon Army, is well known throughout the land. In reality, he only sits on the throne out of a sense of obligation. Even as he complains about the boredom of his royal duties, he continues to work diligently.

itemIntroductions.weapon: The Dark Dragons are Demons created to slay the dragons, the arbitrators of the world. During the war 100 years ago, these Dark Dragons killed and devoured countless dragons. A few of the surviving dragons have gone insane from the rage and the shame, and they eventually turned into Mad Dragons. They are now nothing more than giant monsters powered by their destructive instincts. Phillop and his Dwarves have been hunting these Dark Dragons and Mad Dragons since the Demon War, gathering their remains to forge legendary items.
itemIntroductions.soul:
Phillop's concern grew each day as the darkness within Atein grew stronger.
While the weapon bore great power made from the remains of tainted souls like the Draconics and Mad Dragons, it also harbored the threat of evil impurities that could possess the mind of its wielder.
Phillop made many attempts to suppress the foul energy of Atein, but they had only served as a temporary band-aid.

Phillop contemplated day and night, wondering what could fully detain the foul energy of Atein. He came to the conclusion that it was the Dwarves that could stop this treacherous energy, as Dwarves were the ones who killed Draconics and Mad Dragons the most. After some thought, Phillop ground the Horn of the First Dwarven King and applied it to Atein.

The result was nothing short of a great success. The evil residues etched in the remains could not help but succumb to the energy of the mighty Dwarven king, and they no longer resisted its master.
With the strongest Dwarf by his side, Phillop had nothing to fear.
Whenever Phillop swung Atein, he could feel the First Dwarven King's hearty laughter and his mighty presence.
treasures: A golden shield decoration that has the image of a Mad Dragon engraved on it. Dwarf master artisans gave it to King Phillop as a present for his remarkable work in hunting Mad Dragons. Phillop did not put it on his shield as it was a little too fancy to use in combat, but he always carries it as a charm to show his gratitude to the warm-hearted artisans.

Ancient Dwarf King's capricorn helmet. It is made from the gold of dragons that was obtained after defeating the greedy dark dragon Bokrug. The magnificent golden horn of the helmet is imbued with the dark dragon's magic that will slow down an enemy who is hit with Headbutt.

A hammer that the ancient Dwarven King received as a gift from the Earth Elemental. It was a gift that the King received for saving the Gnome Kingdom from the attacks of the evil Earth Dragon Azi Dahaka. Upon using Earth Incarnate, this ceremonial hammer, imbued with the blessing of the spirit of the earth, increases DEF with the power of the earth's spirit, and grants immunity to HP recovery and CC.

A hammer made of Titanium, the legendary metal forged by giants. It is powerful enough to crush through any legendary weapons and armor. After the Demon War, only 3 of them are known to exist in Orvelia.
